availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George D. Blick (Caldwell County, Lyon County, farmer and private in 3rd Ky Mtd Ind. (csa))

body.p: Caldwell County and Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Lyon County, Kentucky, native. Son of Mary J. Blick. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1861. Served in the 3rd Regiment Kentucky Mounted Infantry (C.S.A.) as private from August 19, 1861, to November 27, 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 382A.
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0090.
"George D. Blick (1833-1899)," Find A Grave, Memorial #31702449, accessed September 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/31702449.
